description: A stunning, mostly red lory with green wings, a patch of yellow on its back, and a bright orange beak. They are known for their very talkative nature.
temperament: Outgoing, playful, and very affectionate. They are highly social birds that thrive on interaction and can become very cuddly with their owners.
loudness: Very Loud. True to their name, they chatter constantly and also have a loud, ringing call.
vocalization: Excellent talkers. They are among the best talking lories and can develop a large vocabulary of words and phrases, mixed in with their constant chattering.
dietaryNeeds: Requires a commercial nectar formula as the base of their diet. This should be supplemented with fresh, soft fruits like papaya and mango, and edible flowers.
healthPointers: Can live for 20-30 years. Like all lories, their droppings are liquid and messy. They need constant mental stimulation to prevent boredom and related stress behaviors.
housing: Not suitable for apartments due to their very high noise level. They need a large, active cage, minimum 36"W x 24"D x 30"H.
